title: Looking at Chicago’s Surprising Season. Plus, Are the Bucks the Championship Favorites?
description:
Wos is joined by Amin Elhassan of Meadowlark Media and SiriusXM NBA Radio to discuss the Bulls’ surprising season and investigate whether their success is sustainable in the playoffs (2:30). Then, they get into the Bucks and whether they should be considered the championship favorites (18:49).
Host: Wosny Lambre
Guest: Amin Elhassan
Production: Carlos Chiriboga
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
